description: This PHP source file handles WiFi network configuration updates based on JSON input, setting security modes, SSID names, passwords, and applying settings for both 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz WiFi bands.
external_files: possibly external scripts or libraries that provide setStr and DmExtSetStrsWithRootObj functions, not explicitly included in the snippet

methods.name: MiniApplySSID
methods.description: A function to trigger re-application of WiFi settings to a specific SSID by setting device configuration strings.
